Alright. Here's a fix for all of you having troubles with saves.

*this is for the reloaded release*

This update is to be applied with the original crack. The original crack has a folder in it named out. Within that folder are two folders named profiles and save. This is where your saves will go. Without these folders you will not get your saves! Copy them over, or create them, as they are originally empty. Good luck, and I hope this helps.

*This fix is not meant to work with this updated crack. I used the original located within the reloaded disc.*

Ok, so I did what Ithink said to do about the out folder but it did not work.. So I started thinking he is on to something because it needs folders to save to. So I uninstalled the game and re-installed orginalDead.Island.Cracked.Fullrepack-ALI213 [.Dude.[ put an out folder in the main directory and then inside the out folder put Profiles and a Save folder.. Restarted game and got to a save point exit the game and bam! The continue icon poped up, got out of the game went to windows restarted game and it works now with saves and key bindings saved also.. I Have not used this update yet but I'm thinking you can as long as your out folder is in the main directory.

For those having trouble with saves not working after patch. I beat the game on patch 1.0. Then I saw the 1.2 update and installed that and it appeared the game had deleted my save. However when I patched the game back to 1.0 it worked again.

I found that the save file is in your steam userdata and there is an out folder in there with the profile and save. It looks like when we update, the game updates but it then can no longer read the save from the previous version. Not sure how to correct this.

Apparently legit steam users got their saves patched.
